content.prompt: In the context of the entire poem, it is clear that "if ever" (line 1) expresses the speaker's

choices.label: desire that his friend should never turn against him
failure to live up to his friend's ideals
assumption that he will prove worthy of his friend's trust

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
